attributes.review: The app is not user friendly at all and keeps glitching. Seems to be a lot of issues with this.
attributes.title: Horrible app

attributes.review: Unfortunately I attempted to open the app but my phone is broken and no matter where I touch it, it doesn’t pop up. Strange though, every other app opens. Huh¿?
attributes.title: Tr(u/a)mp

attributes.review: So I downloaded this app because I am Trump support but then I got this type of message it said “virus 354” and immediately got so scared 😭 so pls fix it 🙏🙏🙏🙏
attributes.title: My phone got some type of virus

attributes.review: Whenever I would open the app it would just say something weird like “you’re Orange” but I know that’s not true so I say “Nah Trump is”🧚✨😍🥰. THEN A DINOSAUR APPEARS!😰  This app makes absolutely no sense AND ITS TERRIFYING!!! DO NOT INSTALL😱😨😰 Love you trump✨🧚🥰😍 but replace the the love with hate✨😍🧚🥰🥵
attributes.title: THE WOST APP EVER! AND THE SCARIEST!

attributes.review: This app kept on showing me little children that are you know what...along with little messages of Trump fantasizing about his daughter. Absolutely disgusting app that I think should be token down👍🏽🤩
attributes.title: TERRIBLE APP, TERRIBLE PRESIDENT

attributes.review: Worst app in history!!! Gives false information! Complete racist. Doesn’t support black lives. Targets immigrants, targets black lives any minority including those that have a disability. Ugh NEXT CALLER
This app glitches wayy to much, it is slow, and it takes to much space in my phone :( this app is horrible
attributes.title: Soooooo slow

attributes.review: i just downloaded this app and within minutes my brand new iphone started glitching and heating up, making weird noises...... i would not recommend.
attributes.title: GIVES YOU BAD INTERNET VIRUSES!!!!!!

attributes.review: The app glitches CONSTANTLY, pretty much unable to open the app without it crashing or glitching. Not worth the space on your phone  DO NOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.title: Do not recommend

attributes.review: As soon as I downloaded this app my phone exploded !! For the sake of your technology I refrain from downloading this horrible waste of space.
attributes.title: absolute waste of time
